h6201.definition: a primitive root; to droop; hence, to drip; drop (down).

h6202.definition: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of slopping); properly, to bend downward; but used only as a denominative from {{h6203}},; to break the neck; hence (figuratively) to destroy; that is beheaded, break down, break (cut off, strike off) neck.

h6203.definition: from {{h6202}}; the nape or back of the neck (as declining); hence, the back generally (whether literal or figurative); back ((stiff-) neck((-ed).

h6204.definition: feminine of {{h6203}}; mane; Orpah, a Moabitess; Orpah.

h6205.definition: probably from {{h6201}}; gloom (as of a lowering sky); (gross, thick) dark (cloud, -ness).

h6206.definition: a primitive root; to awe or (intransitive) to dread; hence, to harass; be affrighted (afraid, dread, feared, terrified), break, dread, fear, oppress, prevail, shake terribly.

h6207.definition: a primitive root; to gnaw, i.e. (figuratively) eat (by hyberbole); also (participle) a pain; fleeing, sinew.

h6208.definition: patrial from an unused name meaning a tush; an Arkite or inhabitant of Erek; Arkite.

h6209.definition: a primitive root; to bare; figuratively, to demolish; make bare, break, raise up (perhaps by clerical error for raze), × utterly.

h6210.definition: from an unused root meaning perhaps to arch; a couch (properly, with a canopy); bed(-stead), couch.

h6211.definition: from {{h6244}}; a moth; moth. See also {{h5906}}.

h6212.definition: from an unused root meaning to glisten (or be green); grass (or any tender shoot); grass, herb.

h6213.definition: a primitive root; to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application; accomplish, advance, appoint, apt, be at, become, bear, bestow, bring forth, bruise, be busy, × certainly, have the charge of, commit, deal (with), deck,   displease, do, (ready) dress(-ed), (put in) execute(-ion), exercise, fashion,   feast, (fight-) ing man,   finish, fit, fly, follow, fulfill, furnish, gather, get, go about, govern, grant, great,   hinder, hold (a feast), × indeed,   be industrious,   journey, keep, labour, maintain, make, be meet, observe, be occupied, offer,   officer, pare, bring (come) to pass, perform, pracise, prepare, procure, provide, put, requite, × sacrifice, serve, set, shew, × sin, spend, × surely, take, × thoroughly, trim, × very,   vex, be (warr-) ior, work(-man), yield, use.

h6214.definition: from {{h6213}} and {{h410}}; God has made; Asahel, the name of four Israelites; Asahel.

h6215.definition: apparently a form of the passive participle of {{h6213}} in the original sense of handling; rough (i.e. sensibly felt); Esav, a son of Isaac, including his posterity; Esau.

h6216.definition: from {{h6231}}; oppressive (as noun, a tyrant); oppressor.

h6217.definition: or עָשֻׁק; passive participle of {{h6231}}; used in plural masculine as abstractly, tyranny; oppressed(-ion). [Doubtful.]

h6218.definition: or עָשֹׂר; from {{h6235}}; ten; by abbreviated form ten strings, and so a decachord; (instrument of) ten (strings, -th).

h6220.definition: for {{h6219}}; bright; Ashvath, an Israelite; Ashvath.

h6221.definition: from {{h6213}} and {{h410}}; made of God; Asiel, an Israelite; Asiel.

h6222.definition: from {{h6213}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has made; Asajah, the name of three or four Israelites; Asaiah.

h6223.definition: from {{h6238}}; rich, whether literal or figurative (noble); rich (man).

h6224.definition: from {{h6235}}; tenth; by abbreviation, tenth month or (feminine) part; tenth (part).

h6225.definition: a primitive root; to smoke, whether literal or figurative; be angry (be on a) smoke.

h6227.definition: from {{h6225}}; smoke, literally or figuratively (vapor, dust, anger); smoke(-ing).

h6228.definition: the same as {{h6227}}; Ashan, a place in Palestine; Ashan.

h6229.definition: a primitive root (identical with {{h6231}}); to press upon, i.e. quarrel; strive with.

h6231.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h6229}}); to press upon, i.e. oppress, defraud, violate, overflow; get deceitfully, deceive, defraud, drink up, (use) oppress(-ion), -or), do violence (wrong).

h6232.definition: from {{h6231}}; oppression; Eshek, an Israelite; Eshek.

h6233.definition: from {{h6231}}; injury, fraud, (subjectively) distress, (concretely) unjust gain; cruelly, extortion, oppression, thing (deceitfully gotten).

h6235.definition: masculine of term עֲשָׂרָה; from {{h6237}}; ten (as an accumulation to the extent of the digits); ten, (fif-, seven-) teen.

h6236.definition: (Aramaic) masculine עֲשְׂרָה (Aramaic); corresponding to {{h6235}}; ten; ten,   twelve.

h6237.definition: a primitive root (identical with {{h6238}}); to accumulate; but used only as denominative from {{h6235}}; to tithe, i.e. to take or give a tenth; × surely, give (take) the tenth, (have, take) tithe(-ing, -s), × truly.

h6238.definition: a primitive root; properly, to accumulate; chiefly (specifically) to grow (causatively, make) rich; be(-come, en-, make, make self, wax) rich, make (1 Kings 22:48 marg). See {{h6240}}.

h6240.definition: for {{h6235}}; ten (only in combination), i.e. -teen; also (ordinal) -teenth; (eigh-, fif-, four-, nine-, seven-, six-, thir-) teen(-th), + eleven(-th), + sixscore thousand, + twelve(-th).

h6241.definition: or עִשָּׂרֹן; from {{h6235}}; (fractional) a tenth part; tenth deal.

h6242.definition: from {{h6235}}; twenty; also (ordinal) twentieth; (six-) score, twenty(-ieth).

h6244.definition: a primitive root; probably to shrink, i.e. fail; be consumed.

h6245.definition: a primitive root; probably to be sleek, i.e. glossy; hence (through the idea of polishing) to excogitate (as if forming in the mind); shine, think.

h6249.definition: apparently masculine plural construction of {{h6247}} in the sense of an afterthought (used only in connection with {{h6240}} in lieu of {{h259}}); eleven or (ordinal) eleventh; eleven(-th).

h6252.definition: or עַשְׁתָּרֹת; plural of {{h6251}}; Ashtaroth, the name of a Sidonian deity, and of a place East of the Jordan; Asharoth, Astaroth. See also {{h1045}}, {{h6253}}, {{h6255}}.

h6253.definition: probably for {{h6251}}; Ashtoreth, the Phoenician goddess of love (and increase); Ashtoreth.

h6254.definition: patrial from {{h6252}}; an Ashterathite or inhabitant of Ashtaroth; Ashterathite.

h6255.definition: from {{h6252}} and the dual of {{h7161}}; Ashtaroth of (the) double horns (a symbol of the deity); Ashteroth-Karnaim, a place East of the Jordan; Ashtoreth Karnaim.

h6256.definition: from {{h5703}}; time, especially (adverb with preposition) now, when, etc.; after, (al-) ways, × certain,   continually,   evening, long, (due) season, so (long) as, (even-, evening-, noon-) tide, (meal-), what) time, when.

h6257.definition: a primitive root; to prepare; make fit, be ready to become.

h6258.definition: from {{h6256}}; at this time, whether adverb, conjunction or expletive; henceforth, now, straightway, this time, whereas.

h6260.definition: or עַתֻּד; from {{h6257}}; prepared, i.e. full grown; spoken only (in plural) of he-goats, or (figuratively) leaders of the people; chief one, (he) goat, ram.

h6262.definition: for {{h6261}}; Attai, the name of three Israelites; Attai.

h6264.definition: from {{h6257}}; prepared; by implication, skilful; feminine plural the future; also treasure; things that shall come, ready, treasures.

h6265.definition: from {{h5790}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has helped; Athajah, an Israelite; Athaiah.

h6266.definition: from {{h6275}}; properly, antique, i.e. venerable or splendid; durable.

h6267.definition: from {{h6275}}; removed, i.e. weaned; also antique; ancient, drawn.

h6269.definition: from an unused root meaning to sojourn; lodging; Athak, a place in Palestine; Athach.

h6270.definition: from an unused root meaning to compress; constringent; Athlai, an Israelite; Athlai.

h6271.definition: or עֲתַלְיָהוּ; from the same as {{h6270}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has constrained; Athaljah, the name of an Israelitess and two Israelites; Athaliah.

h6272.definition: a primitive root; probably to glow, i.e. (figuratively) be desolated; be darkened.

h6273.definition: from an unused root meaning to force; forcible; Othni, an Israelite; Othni.

h6274.definition: from the same as {{h6273}} and {{h410}}; force of God; Othniel, an Israelite; Othniel.

h6275.definition: a primitive root; to remove (intransitive or transitive) figuratively, to grow old; specifically, to transcribe; copy out, leave off, become (wax) old, remove.

h6277.definition: from {{h6275}} in the sense of license; impudent; arrogancy, grievous (hard) things, stiff.

h6278.definition: from {{h6256}} and {{h7011}}; time of a judge; Eth-Katsin, a place in Palestine; Ittahkazin (by including directive enclitic).

h6279.definition: a primitive root (rather denominative from {{h6281}}); to burn incense in worship, i.e. intercede (reciprocally, listen to prayer); intreat, (make) pray(-er).

h6280.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) abundant; deceitful, multiply.

h6281.definition: from {{h6280}}; abundance; Ether, a place in Palestine; Ether.

h6282.definition: from {{h6280}}; also compare {{h6279}}; incense (as increasing to a volume of smoke); hence	a worshipper; suppliant, thick.

h6284.definition: a primitive root; to puff, i.e. blow away; scatter into corners.

h6285.definition: feminine of {{h6311}}; properly, mouth in a figurative sense, i.e. direction, region, extremity; corner, end, quarter, side.

h6286.definition: a primitive root; also denominative from {{h6288}},; to gleam, i.e. (causatively) embellish; figuratively, to boast; also to explain (i.e. make clear) oneself; to shake a tree; beautify, boast self, go over the boughs, glorify (self), glory, vaunt self.

h6287.definition: from {{h6286}}; an embellishment, i.e. fancy head-dress; beauty, bonnet, goodly, ornament, tire.

h6288.definition: or פֹּרָאה; or פֻּארָה; from {{h6286}}; properly, ornamentation, i.e. (plural) foliage (including the limbs) as bright green; bough, branch, sprig.

h6289.definition: from {{h6286}}; properly, illuminated, i.e. a glow; as noun, a flush (of anxiety); blackness.

h6290.definition: from {{h6286}}; ornamental; Paran, a desert of Arabia; Paran.

h6291.definition: from an unused root meaning to be torpid, i.e.; crude; an unripe fig; green figuratively

h6292.definition: or פִּגֻּל; from an unused root meaning to stink; properly, fetid, i.e. (figuratively) unclean (ceremonially); abominable(-tion, thing).

h6293.definition: a primitive root; to impinge, by accident or violence, or (figuratively) by importunity; come (betwixt), cause to entreat, fall (upon), make intercession, intercessor, intreat, lay, light (upon), meet (together), pray, reach, run.

h6295.definition: from {{h6294}} and {{h410}}; accident of God; Pagiel, an Israelite; Pagiel.

h6296.definition: a primitive root; to relax, i.e. become exhausted; be faint.

h6297.definition: from {{h6296}}; a carcase (as limp), whether of man or beast; figuratively, an idolatrous image; carcase, corpse, dead body.

h6298.definition: a primitive root; to come in contact with, whether by accident or violence; figuratively, to concur; meet (with, together).

h6299.definition: a primitive root; to sever, i.e. ransom; generally to release, preserve; × at all, deliver, × by any means, ransom, (that are to be, let be) redeem(-ed), rescue, × surely.

h6300.definition: from {{h6299}} and {{h410}}; God has ransomed; Pedahel, an Israelite; Pedahel.
